Description.Name: Elle Swanson
Description.Details: Elle Swanson, callsign "Hydra" is a young MechWarrior recognized for her exceptional versatility and prowess on the battlefield. Raised in a military family, she inherited a legacy of valor and dedication to the Inner Sphere. From an early age, she demonstrated a remarkable aptitude for piloting BattleMechs and quickly rose through the ranks. As "Hydra", her strategic ingenuity makes her a formidable opponent, capable of seamlessly transitioning between offensive and defensive roles.
